to_after_key_up.shell_command: open -a 'Windows App' && sleep 0.2 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 48 using {option down}'

to_if_held_down.shell_command: sleep 0.2 && /Applications/emacsclient --no-wait --eval '(url-paste-and-go)' && sleep 0.05 && open -a 'Emacs' && osascript -e "tell application \"Finder\" to set visible of process \"Brave\" to false"

to_after_key_up.shell_command: defaults write -g InitialKeyRepeat -int 10 && defaults write -g KeyRepeat -int 2 && echo "normal min 15 (225 ms) and 2 (30 ms)"
